how-to-record-and-analyse-a-climbing-vid.title: How to record and analyse a climbing video
instructions: 1) Navigate to the Recorder, choose your desired setting (e.g. front or back camera) then press Start Recording.
2) Once you've recorded a video, navigate to Analyse and add the video you'd like to analyse.

3) Once you've added the video/s, press Detect and submit once you fill out the form with following details: the video and the timestamp in seconds (e.g. 00:00:05 = 5) of the video frame you'd like to analyse.
4) Wait a few seconds and the analysed frame should appear below the videos.
5) Rinse and repeat for one or more videos.
